advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This is the weather app with personality... if you’re OK with sarcasm, political jokes and the occasional insult. How good is it at the weather part? Drawing data from Foreca, one of meteorology’s more accurate forecasting services, it's pretty great.
editorialNotes.short: Check the forecast from your wrist with Siri.

editorialNotes.tagline: Follow the position of the sun

editorialNotes.standard: Stay up to date when visiting the beach. Track the tide, moon rise and more with an elegantly designed interface that we can’t help but take a peek at, even if we’re far from the shore.

ios.subtitle: UK Air map. Weather fly assist
